AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: location used for comparative direction, north of the events' location
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Corinth, Texas: registration location of one of the vehicles, suburb of Dallas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dallas-Fort Worth: registration location of one of the vehicles, part of the metroplex
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: rural road where the vehicles were traveling, characterized by limited traffic and used for smuggling routes, has a wind farm with an office and entrance on the west side
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location where Agent Montemayor arrived to conduct interviews with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., near Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexico border: International boundary where roving Border Patrol stops are conducted, proximity to which is a factor in determining reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 85: common smuggling route that avoids immigration checkpoints, located in the Big Bend area
